taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in swamps, brooks and small streams in the coastal rainforest (Ref. 3788).  Not a seasonal killifish.  Is easy to maintain in the aquarium (Ref. 27139).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: Range Description
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. 2010. Aphyosemion striatum. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: A Lower Guinea endemic, found in the lower Mitemele River (Equatorial Guinea), and in the Mbei (or Mbe), Komo, Abanga and lower Ogowe Rivers (Gabon).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  lower Mitémele river drainage in southern Equatorial Guinea and the Mbei, Komo, Gabon, Abanga and lower Ogowe river drainages in northwestern Gabon.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: West-central Africa: Gabon and Equitorial Guinea.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; non-migratory; freshwater; pH range: 6.0 - 7.0; dH range: 5 - 12
